posts.post_content: Card is on hold.   Thanks for all of the interest.
Toby--what makes you think that team is the Providence Grays?

According to deadballera.com this is a cabinet photo of the 1896 providence grays minor league team with 13 players who played in the majors....  Please correct me if I am wrong here.  I would appreciate the help.

Roster  
Charley Bassett 
Michael Bryant     
Jim Canavan 
Dan Coogan
Jimmy Cooney 
Ed Crane 
Edward Dixon  
Cozy Dolan 
Jake Drauby 
Bill Friel 
George Hodson 
Joe Knight 
John Knorr 
Ted Lewis 
Harry Lyons
Billy Murray 
Frank Rudderham
Could be that. I thought the implication was that it was the major league team which it obviously is not.
